pages.text: $(li)The Chorus Fruit is a food that can be obtained when you cut a $(l)Chorus Plant$() in the End.$(br)$(li)If you eat it, you will be teleported up to eight blocks in any direction.

$(li)You can obtain a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/popped_chorus_fruit)Popped Chorus Fruit$(/l) smelting a Chorus Fruit in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can use it to craft $(l)Chorus Planks$(), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/chorus_on_a_stick)Chorus Fruit on a Stick$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/quark/magnet)Magnet$(/l), or a $(l)Chorus Fruit Batch$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.
